results.hook_text: The powers that be have been hiding a 150-year-old secret from you. Want to know what it is?
results.caption: The powers that be have been hiding a 150-year-old secret from you. Want to know what it is?

results.hook_text: "The world's most ancient engineers didn't need Google.
results.caption:
"The world's most ancient engineers didn't need Google.

(And then the rest of the caption continues...)

What looks like a simple, beautiful spiral is actually applied physics, hydrology, and acoustic engineering, encoded into stone centuries ago. 💡

This shape with its counterclockwise vs clockwise pattern mimics the flow of electromagnetism…the Torus field.

It’s the perfect example of bio mimicry at play.

As Viktor Schauberger famously said…“Comprehend and copy Nature.”

Lets dive deeper into the spiral and how this is genius.

Account: @originals

results.hook_text: You've been living in a body that's 90% untapped potential, but only 10% aware of its true capabilities.
results.caption:
You've been living in a body that's 90% untapped potential, but only 10% aware of its true capabilities.

What if I told you that your entire existence has been built on a lie about what your body is truly capable of?
